roleset.name: fixed, fixated, decided on

roles.note: There is room for an arg0-cause if we need to unify this. It corresponds to 'he set his sights on'.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on SMS.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Kendall 's set on xr but I 'd rather go to ck . I just feel bad since it 's her bday

roleset.name: ready for action
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on SMS.

example.name: arg1
example.text: I actually ended up contacting a friend in fort greene to stay with so I 'm all set . Thanks for the offer though man !
